titleStmt.title: August 24, 1661. The vice-chancellour and major, respectively, in His Majesties name, doe streightly charge and command ...
titleStmt.author: University of Oxford.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Richard Baylie Vice-Chan. Oxon. Sampson White Major.
Title taken from first lines of text.
With woodcut ornament at head of text.
An order to bury dead animals or pay a fine.
Reproduction of the original at the Oxford University Archives.
